price: 15. ils diraient : « Nos vues sont obnubilées, et peut-être même sommes nous des gens ensorcelés ! »
arabic: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qawmun masḥūrūna
